item.title: Calibans War
item.description: score: 5/5 I couldn’t put this title down from page one. Where in Leviathans Wake I was impressed by the world building and just wild adventure, in caliban’s war the character and story arcs were on a completely different level. From a war breaking out in the solar systems only bread basket too running full throttle towards a space mutant and even a kidnapping with character assassination I was absolutely delighted.

item.title: Leviathan Wakes
item.description: Score: 5/5 really great world building, interesting plot and just enough tension to really feel like an adventure. I was a little confused when reading this book at first since the prologue was really odd. That and the whiplash we get as we are first getting introduced into the world that James Corey paints for us. For me my favorite character was Miller, and I was enjoying the tug of what felt like two protagonists in a single story.
